Name: LU 134 - Planning, La Cabana â€“ Article V Plan and Project (20185435 HAK)
Title: Resolution to approve modification to a previously approved plan and project located at Block 3022, Lots 16 and 25 (formerly Block 3022, Lots 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 44, 45, 46, 47 and 48) and Block 3031, Lot 18 (formerly Block 3031, Lot 16), Community District 1, Borough of Brooklyn (Preconsidered L.U. No. 134; 20185435 HAK).

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj By Council Members Salamanca and Kallos\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720   \tab WHEREAS, the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development ("HPD") submitted to the Council on June 5, 2018 its request dated June 5, 2018 that the Council modify the previously approved Article V Plan and Project located at Block 3022, Lots 16 and 25 (formerly Block 3022, Lots 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 44, 45, 46, 47 and 48) and Block 3031, Lot 18 (formerly Block 3031, Lot 16), Community District 1, Council District 34, Borough of Brooklyn (the \ldblquote Original Plan and Project\rdblquote ) to facilitate the development of two new buildings (the \ldblquote Development Parcels\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri720\qj\tx0\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\tab WHEREAS, the Original Plan and Project was approved pursuant to the PHFL Section 114 by the Board of Estimate on December 16, 1982 (Cal. No. 21);\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, HPD seeks the deletion of portions of Block 3022, Lot 16 (Tentative Lot 116) and Block 3031, Lot 18 (Tentative Lot 118), from the Original Plan and Project pursuant to Section 115 of the Private Housing Finance Law;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx662\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Development Parcels on June 19, 2018; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx2520\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx662\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and financial implications and other policy issues relating to the Development Parcels.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The Council approves, pursuant to Section 115 of the PHFL, the deletion of Block 3022, Lot 16 (Tentative Lot 116) and Block 3031, Lot 18 (Tentative Lot 118), from the Original Plan and Project.  All references in the Plan and Project to Block 3022, Lot 16 and Block 3031, Lot 18 are modified to exclude the premises described in schedule in Schedules A and B, attached hereto.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
Adopted. \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on June 28, 2018, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\par
